features.title: GitHub 2 way sync
features.description:
January 25, 2026
Our GitHub integration just upgrade with 2-way sync, bringing full version control and a smoother development workflow.

With this update, you can:

Keep your Base44 app and GitHub repository automatically in sync

Collaborate with multiple contributors on the same app through GitHub

Work in your preferred IDE and sync changes back through GitHub

This makes it easier to manage changes, collaborate at scale, and build with the tools you already use.
Base44 is the AI-powered platform that lets users build fully functioning apps in minutes. Using nothing but natural language, Base44 enables anyone to turn their words into personal productivity apps, back-office tools, customer portals, or complete enterprise products that are ready to use, no integrations required.
© 2026 Base44 Inc. All rights reserved.
We use cookies and similar technologies. You can opt-out by clicking 'Do Not Sell or Share My Personal Information' at the bottom of the page.

features.title: NPM packages
features.description:
December 4, 2025
You can now bring any web library from NPM into your Base44 apps, including GSAP, Radix UI, anime.js, and many more.

These packages cover animation, 3D, UI components, charts, forms, and media, all accessible directly from the builder. Just tell the builder which package you want to use and it will be added automatically.

This unlocks a new level of creativity and functionality. You can build apps with premium motion, advanced 3D scenes, smarter interactions, richer dashboards, file uploads, image editing, and video players, all with more polish and capability.

features.title: Act as a user
features.description:
December 3, 2025

One of the fastest ways to test, troubleshoot, and fine-tune your user experience, now live in your dashboard.

Learn more: https://docs.base44.com/Integrations/Connectors

features.title: New Agent builder
features.description:
October 26, 2025
We rolled out the new Agent Builder, now powering all new apps in Base44. (Existing Base/Wix apps will continue using the legacy builder for now. The new Agent Builder lets you describe a task, then it automatically selects and orchestrates the right tools to complete it.

Initial toolset includes:
-Edit / read files
-Create / read / update / delete database entities
-Web search
-Fetch content from URLs

What to expect:
-Fewer errors and more stable multi-step flows
-Improved composition for complex, multi-agent apps

features.title: WhatsApp integration for Agents
features.description:
September 21, 2025
Base44 now supports seamless integration with WhatsApp, enabling you to bring your agents directly into the messaging platform. This enhancement allows your applications to be more intelligent, practical, and interconnected.

With this integration, Base44 Agents can perform the following actions:
- Read, create, edit, and delete records in your entities
- Trigger backend functions
- Process images using Optical Character Recognition (OCR)
- Receive and manage voice messages

features.title: Agentic apps
features.description:
September 14, 2025
Introducing Base44 Agentic Apps: you can now integrate AI agents into your apps effortlessly. Agents leverage built-in tools such as database access, backend function integrations, and web data, among others. This versatility supports a wide range of applications, empowering you to innovate with ease and bring ideas to life without the need for complex development.

Use Cases:

nteractive CRM: Communicate with your CRM to access and update records seamlessly.

Task Management: Convert meeting notes into tasks automatically with an AI-driven task management app.

Content Production: Scale your content creation with an AI agent that learns and adapts to your writing style.

Gaming: Utilize an AI agent to write game code, transforming your game ideas into reality.

features.title: Base44 Partners
features.description:
September 11, 2025

Partners can apply through a streamlined application flow. Approval is based on the submitted application and alignment with program criteria.

features.title: Workspace-level SSO
features.description:
October 31, 2025
Enterprise admins can now set up SSO once at the workspace level and have it automatically apply across all apps, no more configuring auth for each app individually.

What’s new:
-App builders can enable Workspace SSO with a simple toggle in their app’s authentication settings.
-All apps in the workspace will use the same SSO provider (Google, Okta, etc.) configured by the admin.
-Enterprise admins can enforce workspace SSO, locking authentication across all apps and preventing changes.

features.title: Claude Sonnet 4.5
features.description:
September 29, 2025
We’ve rolled out Claude Sonnet 4.5, Anthropic’s most capable model yet. And, it’s now the default engine in Base44 so you’ll get these improvements automatically when you start building.

Sonnet 4.5 delivers major upgrades across reasoning, context length, and execution speed. It handles long-running tasks, multi-step workflows, and domain-specific logic (e.g. finance, research, cybersecurity, data analysis) with ease.

Feature highlights:
-Extended context for larger prompts and documents
-Improved accuracy and consistency in complex workflows
-Faster, cleaner outputs even from single prompts
-Optimized for specialized use cases, from spreadsheets to presentations
